Reviews.Title: Perfect for golf instructors
Reviews.Author: Dario Lozano
Reviews.Content: High definition, the planes in the led are very helpfulleasy to uselong batteryand also little size pocket

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Len Pettiford
Reviews.Content: Although small in size, it has surprisingly, a lot of features-some that blew my mind. Especially the slow motion one. Also tt takes a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Can Help Your Golf Swing
Reviews.Author: Bob Fruchey
Reviews.Content: For starters, this camera takes great pictures, but I purchased it to help myself and friends with golf swings.  It has 240 fps, 480 fps, and 1000 fps.  I am sort of a clutz with this stuff, but I can use the 240 fps and 480 fps settings to analyze swings.  There are special settings just for golf with lines for spine angle, etc.  If you really want to improve your game, you must see your golf swing.  The viewing screen is small, but you can plug the camera into a computer for a great viewing.  It is worth the money if you really want to improve your game.
